Summary I am a seasoned digital expert in business development, strategic partnerships and new ventures.  
 
I currently head up Google Play Apps and Games for Western Europe (UK, DACH, FR, ES, IT). We work with app developers and help to make them successful on Android.  
 
Previously, I did work on new ads initiatives within the product partnerships team at Google London, particularly on data and product partnerships for our advertising products to improve targeting and measurement. I have also done projects in different verticals such as commerce/shopping, B2B, Education, or policy/cultural sector.  
 
For the last 3 years, I am also involved in organising SVC2UK (www.svc2uk.com), a series of tech and entrepreneurship events in London and Cambridge, as well as Google Campus, Google's space for Entrepreneurs in East London, where I managed partnerships.  
 
I bring experience of working for Google in various teams and locations, including Apps BD, Mobile, Business Development, Financial Operations (payments/fraud), change management and operations.  
 
I hold an MBA from Cambridge, speak English, German and French, and have worked in various countries including the US, India, Ireland and the UK.  
 
Specialties: Business Development, Data partnerships, Monetization, Innovation, New Ventures, Change management, Online media, Online Advertising, Payments, Business Process Design, Fraud Operations, People Management, Scaling and Building operational teams. - Supporting Google's top advertisers within the retail sector on a daily basis 
- Managing trusted relationships with clients and agencies while developing a thorough understanding of their business challenges

- Developing compelling advertising solutions for retail brand advertisers as well as providing scalable support solutions for rapid-growth consumer products 
- Sharing advanced knowledge of Google products with clients 
- Improving clients' online business performance and revenue generation Apparel/Footwear/Jewellery Lead, Online Sales Google September 2010  –  December 2011  (1 year 4 months) Having previously worked with agencies across a number of industries, I had developed a keen interest in the area of retail. After successfully completing my immersion on the direct sales team I took on a new challenge of leading a team of three in the retail sector specialising in clothing, footwear and jewellery. The portfolio ranged from high end luxury brands to high street fashion retailers. My roles and responsibilities included but were not limited to: 
 
-Working with management to set targets and forecast growth for key accounts 
- Driving the short and long-term strategy for the apparel/footwear and jewellery pod to ensure client satisfaction and fulfilment of sales targets 
- Weekly performance analysis and reporting  
- Developing strong back on track plans and scalable solutions for underperforming clients within the portfolio 
- ​Managing trusted relationships with clients and developing a thorough understanding of their business challenges through C-level engagement 
- ​Leveraging my industry knowledge and expertise to aid this strategic partnership to grow their business

- Achieving if not exceeding aggressive revenue targets without compromising client satisfaction and keeping their best interests at the forefront of all activities Strategic Digital Media Consultant Google July 2010  –  September 2010  (3 months) Due to my extensive product knowledge and strong aptitude for sales and solution selling, I was selected by Senior management to partake in a sales immersion programme for one quarter. This was the first time such a programme was ever run within Google so I embraced the challenge and took on a direct sales role for a three month period. During this time frame I transitioned to the Partnership Development team to take on an acquisition role. My roles and responsibilities on the team were as follows: 
- Prospecting for new clients across the entertainment, retail, travel, auto and health industries 
- Cold calling potential prospects to sell them Google advertising solutions including search, display, YouTube and mobile 
- Providing the ultimate in client service by giving potential new customers the attention they need and deserve to help them understand the advertising platforms and solutions we offer 
- Leading client meetings and face to face pitches for new business 
- Helping to shape and cement the way we work with agencies from an acquisition perspective going forward (drawing on experience from my agency background) 
- Planning, organising and executing a Google onsite acquisition event for the travel industry that led to a number of new clients for Google 
- Ensuring the smooth transition of clients from the acquisition team to the account management team 
- Working towards aggressive revenue targets which I managed to exceed by over 300%. I achieved in quarter revenue of over 100K which is far above that expected of a brand new sales representative. I was rewarded a monetary spot bonus in recognition of this significant over achievement Agency Relationship Manager Google October 2009  –  June 2010  (9 months) As a Relationship Manager at Google on the UK Agency Team, I was responsible for a portfolio of 56 agencies, a total of 200+ clients who advertise with Google using PPC Advertising through Google Adwords. - Responsible for revenue generation and reporting; exceeded targets consistently for the duration of my time on the agency team 
- Agency education on industry trends, best practices and development of their knowledge of the online world and the benefits of advertising online  
- Scheduling and running C-level meetings with key agencies to highlight key opportunities and drive long-term strategy 
- Initiate and implement bespoke paid search programs within strategic markets on time and on budget
